content.rendered:
Peeyo

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Embarking on a creative journey with Peeyo, the vibrant canned mocktail drink brand, Brandemic dived into a realm of refreshment and flavour. Peeyo’s commitment to delivering a delightful mocktail experience became the foundation for a comprehensive exploration of branding, visual identity, brand communication, packaging, web UI/UX, web development, and product photography.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Visual Identity
  • Brand Communication
  • Packaging
  • Web UI/UX
  • Web Development
  • Product Photography

INDUSTRY

  • Food and Beverages

CHALLENGES

Sip, Smile,
Repeat.

01

Deciphering and translating Peeyo’s essence into a cohesive visual identity.

02

Designing packaging that not only showcased the product but also communicated the brand’s essence.

03

Creating a harmonious colour palette to align with Peeyo’s unique canned mocktail packaging.

04

Balancing distinct flavour representations while maintaining a cohesive brand image across the product line.

SOLUTION

Navigating
These Challenges

Brandemic’s solution was a harmonious blend of creativity and strategy. The visual elements seamlessly intertwined with the brand’s narrative, with each mocktail flavour visually represented in a way that resonated with Peeyo’s lively and inviting personality. The packaging was crafted with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring it not only housed a refreshing drink but also became a canvas for Peeyo’s story.

Cheers to
Uncharted Flavors.

IDENTITY

Our approach to Peeyo’s branding was rooted in the idea that every sip should be an adventure. We crafted a visual identity that captured the essence of Peeyo’s diverse mocktail offerings, using vibrant colours, playful graphics, and a touch of sophistication. The brand now stands as a beacon of excitement and innovation in the mocktail market.

Unveil The Flavor
Symphony.

PACKAGING

The packaging design went beyond aesthetics; it became a storytelling medium. Each can be transformed into a mini-canvas, adorned with lively illustrations that mirror the flavours within.

Explore,
Click, Sip.

WEB DEVELOPMENNT

Brandemic extended the brand experience into the digital realm. The website was crafted with a user-centric approach, ensuring a seamless and visually engaging experience. From interactive flavour guides to a smooth online shopping process, every aspect of the web interface was designed to enhance the consumer’s journey.

Canned Mocktails
Made Accessible

By seamlessly blending technology with the brand’s essence, Brandemic ensures that every click on the Peeyo website is an invitation to immerse oneself in the delightful world of canned mocktail bliss.

IMPACT

From Concept
To Cheers

The comprehensive transformation undertaken by Brandemic resulted in Peeyo not just being a canned mocktail brand but a lifestyle. The revitalised branding, packaging, and digital presence resonated with both existing and new consumers. Peeyo now stands proudly on the shelves, inviting consumers to explore and indulge in the blissful world of crafted mocktail experiences. It’s not just a can; it’s a Peeyo moment waiting to be savoured with every sip.
